articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Revolutionary Battle Site in Mt. Madu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Revolutionary Battle Site in Mt. Madu
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the revolutionary battle site in Mt. Madu.
					 The revolutionary battle site in Mt. Madu built as a secret base in the area of Anju in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle was a base for regional leadership, an important base for military operation in the western part of Korea.
					
					 There existed secret camps in Mts. Madu, Sang, Jon and Thukmaek in places favorable in terms of nature and geography and various revolutionary organizations were formed according to the operational plan of President Kim Il Sung. As a result, there appeared a reliable revolutionary fortress for making full preparations for all-people resistance and conducting an operation for a final attack for national liberation.
					
					 After looking round the room for the education in trees bearing slogans, Kim Jong Un watched trees bearing slogans outside.
					
					 The area of Anju where the revolutionary battle site is located was an important operational area for greeting the great event of national liberation, he noted, adding the fact that Kim Il Sung built a secret base there clearly proves that he was a peerlessly great man possessed of far-sighted wisdom.
					
					 He pointed out that the revolutionary battle site in Mt. Madu bears witness to the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation and the indomitable fighting spirit of the Korean people who ushered in a new era of the national liberation struggle in colonies, holding him in high esteem as the center of unity and leadership.
					
					 It is the unshakable will and determination of the WPK to always uphold, carry forward and develop the revolutionary traditions established by Kim Il Sung and complete the Korean revolution, Kim Jong Un stressed. 
					
					 He had a photo session with the employees of the revolutionary battle site, expressing great expectation and belief that they would successfully fulfill their honorable duty.
					
					 The revolutionary battle sites are eternal treasures of the Korean revolution more precious than anything else and important bases for equipping the members of the party, working people, service personnel and youth and students with the revolutionary traditions of the WPK, he noted, setting forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating them and intensifying the education through them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ma Won Chun, Kim Yong Chol and Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Tactical Exercise of KPA Unit 323
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Tactical Exercise of KPA Unit 323
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited a tactical drill ground of KPA Unit 323 honored with the Title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment and guided the exercise.
					 After receiving a report on the plan for the exercise at the observation post, he gave an order to start the exercise.
					
					 Soldiers showed him their admirable actions of occupying the "enemy's position" at a lightning speed, giving it no time to come to itself.
					
					 After watching them strike and destroy the enemy's installations at a lightning speed by performing their combat mission independently and proactively despite adverse conditions, he said that he came to realize that they were good at day-to-day trainings.
					
					 He highly praised them for conducting the most successful exercise under very unfavorable conditions in terms of nature, geography and climate.
					
					 He said that the exercise could prove successful as officers commanded the "battle" while performing difficult duties in the van of soldiers.
					
					 He once again highly praised the commanding officers and officers of the staff of the unit for acquiring capabilities to skillfully organize and command all forms of modern operations and battles and soldiers for being well versed in battle methods for satisfactorily performing their combat duty. He sent thanks to the unit on behalf of KPA supreme commander.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the KPA to organize and conduct drills under the simulated conditions of an actual war.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Yong Gil, Kim Su Gil, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon and Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Vehicles to State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Vehicles to State Academy of Sciences
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent vehicles to the State Academy of Sciences as gifts.
					 The gifts reflect his deep trust and great expectation that the scientists and technicians will uphold the party's policies with bigger scientific and technical achievements and make positive contributions to the prosperity and development of the country.
					
					 A ceremony of conveying the gifts took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Speeches were made to renew their determination at the end of the ceremony.
					
					 The speakers said that immensely profound is the loving care shown by Kim Jong Un for the scientists and technicians, who open a shortcut to building knowledge-based economy, projecting them as precious treasures of the country. 
					
					 They said that officials, scientists and technicians would ride the excellent "steed" provided to them by the party, remaining true to Kim Jong Un's idea of attaching importance to science and his leadership, and thus successfully perform their role as vanguard and propellant in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and President Jang Chol and other officials, scientists, technicians and employees of the Academy.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Pakistani Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Pakistani Ambassador
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday received credentials from Syed Hasan Habib, Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Japan's Militarization Leads to Foolish Self-Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan's Militarization Leads to Foolish Self-Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe in the New Year news conference said now is the time to fight to retake "strong Japan" and that the people's discussions should be deepened to amend the constitution in keeping with the changing times.
					 His remarks were not made deliberately but they fully revealed the sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					
					 It goes on: The gravity and danger of the moves of the Japanese reactionaries to revive militarism lie in that the moves have reached an undisguised phase in which they are not reading the face of the international community.
					
					 The present Abe Cabinet advertising "strong Japan" is rushing headlong into moves to turn Japan into a military giant.
					
					 Japan opts for increasing military expenditure. It is frequently sparking off territorial disputes in the waters around it.
					
					 The Japanese right-wing forces made history textbooks which beautify the war ignited by the Japanese imperialists and justify the past history in a bid to educate the rising generation with them.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are openly bringing the issues of turning their country into a military power and launching reinvasion up for discussion as a state policy and pushing forward with them.
					
					 It is their calculation that if they increase military expenditure and amend the constitution, they can certainly opt for reinvasion legitimately.
					
					 It is now meaningless to discuss whether Japan is a "pacifist state" or a war state.
					
					 Japan, the war state which threw off the mask of the "pacifist state", is emerging as vicious aggression forces in the 21st century dreaming of conquering the world.
					
					 If Japan persists in its moves for militarization and overseas aggression, oblivious of the lesson from the defeat of the Japanese imperialists, this will bring nothing but ruin to it, the article warns.

articles.title: DPRK-China Joint Friendship Meeting Held
articles.content:
DPRK-China Joint Friendship Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The 2014 Lunar New Year's DPRK-China joint friendship meeting took place at the DPRK-China Friendship Thaekam Cooperative Farm in Sunan District, Pyongyang on Thursday under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the farm, the Ministry of Culture of China and its embassy here.
					 Present there were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, Hong Kwang Ung, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials concerned and agricultural workers of the farm, and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy and members of the Jilin Provincial Song and Dance Ensemble of China.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the monument to the on-the-spot instructions of President Kim Il Sung and made bows.
					
					 They were briefed on the fact that Thaekam turned into a socialist modern village under the care of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Liu Hongcai said at the meeting that China would make joint efforts to achieve good successes in various fields in the new year, too.
					
					 Kim Jin Bom sincerely wished the Chinese people great successes in the efforts for translating into a reality the "dream of China" for great prosperity of the Chinese nation.
					
					 Then, an art performance was given by the members of the art group of the farm and the Jilin Provincial Song and Dance Ensemble.
					
					 The performance began with an exciting peasant dance of farmers and a Chinese folk dance, vividly representing the feelings of friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 The participants saw the works created by Chinese handicraft experts and shared traditional Lunar New Year's food of the two countries.
					
					 An aid certificate was conveyed to the farm in the name of the Chinese embassy.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions Opens
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions Opens 
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The 19th Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (February 16), general secretary Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary. 
					 The contest will last till Feb. 11 at the stadiums of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Taekwon-Do Hall and other places. Players will compete in matches of volleyball, table tennis, basketball, Taekwon-Do and tug of war.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier and chairman of the State Planning Commission, Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and officials and players of ministries and national institutions. 
					
					 Ro Tu Chol made an opening address. 
					
					 He said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un made sure that a strong wind of conducting sports swept across the country and the Maskiryong Ski Resort, Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club and other world-class sports and cultural bases were built, showing warm loving care for the development of mass sports. 
					
					 The ceremony was followed by preliminary matches of table tennis and volleyball.

articles.title: Skating Event of Schoolchildren Held
articles.content:
Skating Event of Schoolchildren Held 
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A skating event of the 40th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize took place here from Monday to Thursday. 
					 The event, divided into groups of senior secondary schools, junior secondary schools and primary schools, brought together more than 300 schoolchildren selected in various areas. 
					
					 The winners are boys and girls of Chonggye Senior Secondary School in Rajin area of Rason City, boys of Yokjon Junior Secondary School and girls of Rajin Junior Secondary School in the same area, boys of Taesong Primary School in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, and girls of Hungdok Primary School in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Indian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Madu
 Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Madu.
					 Esta base secreta de la zona de Anju, acondicionada en el periodo de lucha armada antijaponesa, fue centro de direccion regional e importante punto de operacion militar en la parte occidental de Corea.
					
					 Segun el proyecto operacional del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fueron acondicionadas en los puntos de favorables condiciones naturales y geograficas los campamentos secretos de los montes Madu, Sang, Jon y Thukmaek y formadas varias organizaciones revolucionarias.
					
					 De esa manera, se preparo el baluarte de la revolucion que permitio acelerar los preparativos de la resistencia de todo el pueblo y la operacion de ataque final para la liberacion de la patria.
					
					 Tras pasar revista a la sala de conservacion y educacion con los arboles con consignas inscritas, el Mariscal vio los otros al aire libre.
					
					 La zona de Anju, donde esta radicado el lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Madu, fue base importante de operaciones para acoger el gran acontecimiento de liberacion de la patria, dijo.
					
					 Prosiguio que solo con el hecho de que el Presidente escogio aqui como sede del campamento secreto, se puede saber que el fue gran hombre de extraordinaria prevision.
					
					 Senalo que en este lugar estan impregnadas las hazanas imperecederas del Presidente quien cumplio la historica causa de liberacion de la patria y el indoblegable espiritu de lucha del pueblo coreano que comenzo la nueva epoca de la lucha de liberacion nacional de colonias teniendole como centro de unidad y direccion.
					
					 El partido mantiene la firme voluntad y determinacion de defender y profundizar para siempre las tradiciones revolucionarias creadas por el Presidente y llevar a feliz termino la revolucion coreana, destaco.
					
					 Expreso la confianza y conviccion de que los empleados del lugar cumpliran perfectamente su mision y tomo una foto de recuerdo con ellos.
					
					 Recalco que los lugares de batalla revolucionaria son patrimonios eternos de nuestra revolucion, que no se puede comprar ni hacer ni con fabulosos fondos, e importantes puntos de educacion para armar a los militantes del partido, trabajadores, militares, jovenes y ninos con las tradiciones revolucionarias del partido. 
					
					 Seguidamente, presento las tareas importantes que serviran de guia en la administracion de esos lugares e intensificar la educacion en ellos.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Ma Won Chun, Kim Yong Chol y Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: New Kind of Welder Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Welder Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A new kind of mobile rail butt-welding machine was developed by the Railroad Construction Institute of the Branch Academy of Railway Science under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK.
					 In the existing methods, rail butt-welding needs a great deal of power consumption as it is based on the contact electric resistance welding.
					
					 But the newly developed welding machine depends on spark discharge welding, thus preventing oxidation of weld zone and increasing the welding quality with lower power consumption.
					
					 It can be used for butt-welding any kinds of rails.
					
					 The welding machine is well received by users for its serviceability.

articles.title: Solar Water Heater Widely Used in DPRK
articles.content:
Solar Water Heater Widely Used in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Solar water heaters produced by the Solar Heater Company have gained popularity among households in cities and rural communities of the DPRK. 
					 A solar water heater is capable of warming up hundreds liters of water a day. And an increasing number of public bathes are installing the heaters, instead of coal boilers.
					
					Kim Yong Il, director of the company, told KCNA that the solar water heater is well received by users as it is very economic.

articles.title: Experienced Woman Mushroom Cultivator in DPRK
articles.content:
Experienced Woman Mushroom Cultivator in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Experts of mushroom institutes and cultivation units in the DPRK are working hard for mushroom cultivation going on throughout the country.
					 Among them is Choe San Bok, now active at the Moranbong District Greengrocery Wholesale Store in Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe has devoted all her energy and wisdom to mushroom cultivation for decades since she succeeded in developing the technique of cultivation based on activated sludge spores.
					
					 She gave 800-odd lectures on the mushroom cultivation techniques to tens of thousands of people, playing a key role in the introduction of new techniques into various units across the country. She has also produced many spores every year, which are enough to grow large amounts of mushroom.
					
					 Recently, a new rotation production technique was introduced to cultivation units of industrial establishments, co-op farms and others. This is one of the techniques developed by Choe for mushroom cultivation.
					
					 Her practicable mushroom cultivation techniques, popular among different units of the country, include ones related to designing and building of cultivation base, controlling of the rate of substrate and ensuring fermentation temperature for substrate.

articles.title: Pyongyang Jonghyang Building Materials Factory
articles.content:
Pyongyang Jonghyang Building Materials Factory
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Products made by the Pyongyang Jonghyang Building Materials Factory have been widely used in building structures.
					 The quality products have been applied to several important projects like the Okryu Children's Hospital, Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 The products include interior and exterior coating materials in all colors, rust-resisting paints, paints for decorative patterns, glass wall ornamenting materials, lagging materials.
					
					 The highly adhesive paints are considered to be strong in waterproof, counter-aging and climate change and pollution resistances.
					
					 When used as decorative paints, they are very efficient in adding beauty to buildings.
					
					 Among those paints is Jonghyang sound-absorbing paint, which has peculiar character of absorbing sound.
					
					 The factory also produces different kinds of building materials like concrete curing agent indispensable for the construction of high-rises, underground structures and roads and polymerized cement emulsion for waterproofing flat roofs and underground structures.
					
					 Now the demand for the factory's products are daily growing in the DPRK.

articles.title: Peace Is Incompatible with War: News Analysis
articles.content:
Peace Is Incompatible with War: News Analysis
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, in his New Year Address, called on all Koreans to turn out in the struggle for national security and peace in order to make a fresh progress in the national reunification movement.
					 In response to his call, the DPRK National Defence Commission proposed to the south Korean authorities taking practical measures for favorable atmosphere for improved north-south relations and the nation's security and peace.
					
					 The proposal, prompted by the DPRK's patriotic will to defuse the military tension, avert danger of a war and ensure lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula, is now commanding full support from all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 Peace is what all members of the Korean nation have long desired. They all want peace, not a war, and co-existence and common interests of the north and the south, not division and confrontation.
					
					 The Korean nation suffered untold disasters from the 1950-1953 Korean War, enforced by the U.S. imperialists, and has been in the constant war danger for decades. So, peace is more precious to it than any other nation.
					
					Peace is an indispensable prerequisite to the Korean nation's existence and development, and war exercises are a main factor of threatening its existence. If a war breaks out on the peninsula again, no one can get rid of being a victim to this terrible war that will endanger the nation's existence itself.
					
					 Peace is a fundamental guarantee for the country's reunification and prosperity common to the nation.
					
					 Without peace, is it impossible to expect the reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south and their reunification as well as the nation's rosy future.
					
					 Only peaceful circumstance can help all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad build up the base of life for the nation better and achieve the national prosperity for all ages. 
					
					 However, the U.S. and the south Korean authorities, turning aside the requirements of this stark reality, have staged the anti-DPRK nuclear war exercises from the start of the year, massively deploying nuclear arms on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity. They are going to launch the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers late in February.
					
					 In case such maneuvers lead to a skirmish and then develop into an all-out war, only the Korean nation will suffer deadly disasters from it and the Korean Peninsula will be reduced to ruins.
					
					 Defending peace for the nation's security and prosperity can never go together with the war exercises that may entail its extermination.
					
					An end should be put to the war exercises of the U.S. and south Korea to ensure the lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula and protect the nation's destiny and security.
					
					 It is none other than the Koreans who will lead in a responsible manner the anti-war struggle to defend peace from the prevailing danger of war on the peninsula. No one can protect peace in this land on behalf of the Korean nation.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad who love the country and the nation should turn out as one in the struggle for peace.

articles.title: Halt to Military Drills, Key for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Halt to Military Drills, Key for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
						
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK on January 16 made crucial proposals to the south Korean authorities on taking a practical measure of halting all military hostile acts against each other.
					 Halt to all military hostile acts will become a starting point in improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 For over half a century, a cycle of antagonism and military confrontation has been repeated in the Korean Peninsula. And the peninsula has always been prevailed with the touch-and-go situation that even a slightest conflict may lead to an all-out war. If an all-out war, a nuclear war, breaks out on the peninsula, no Korean can escape from the nuclear disaster.
					
					 The national division that lasts over half a century gives everyone a lesson that aggravation of confrontation between the north and the south would result in continuance of division and tragic disaster of war.
					
					 The confrontation between the north and the south serves merely as a chance for the forces, undesirous of seeing reunified Korea, to fish in troubled waters. And it is as clear as noonday that the nuclear war exercises, scheduled from late February in south Korea, will drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a brink of war.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities value the nation's desire for cohesion and harmony, they should stop clinging to war gambles against the fellow countrymen.
					
					 They should show their will for practical action in response to the DPRK's crucial proposals by making a bold decision to stop waging provocative Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills.
					
					 Only then, peace can settle down on the Korean Peninsula with circumstances favorable for improving the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Implementation of Commitment to Registration Fee Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of Commitment to Registration Fee Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century on Jan. 20 held a press conference in Seoul urging the puppet chief executive to implement the commitment to the registration fee.
					 At the press conference the organization accused Park Geun Hye of reneging on the commitment that she would halve the university registration fee. 
					
					 Moreover, universities are going to raise the registration fee, they noted.
					
					 The "government" issued an order that universities should strive by themselves, the organization said, adding that the "government" should work out a concrete plan to implement the commitment to the registration fee.
					
					 The organization warned that it would turn out in the anti-"government" struggle, if the issue of halving the registration fee is included in the list of many commitments on which Park negated.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Dismisses Commitments of Chief Executive of S. Korea as Unbelievable
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Dismisses Commitments of Chief Executive of S. Korea as Unbelievable
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Jan. 11 in an article written by a member of its editorial board termed the proposal made by the south Korean puppet authorities for arranging a reunion of separated families and relatives as hypocritical. 
					 Recalling that Park Geun Hye came out with the proposal for arranging the reunion of separated families and relatives on the occasion of the Lunar New Year's Day, the article noted: 
					
					 If any proposal is to be accepted as a sincere one, the proposer should be trustworthy, to be begin with. However, even a shred of such trust can hardly be found in Park. 
					
					 She has fulfilled none of her election commitments. 
					
					 She has neither reflected nor apologized for failing to fulfill her commitments. She was so shameless as to let loose rhetoric: "I always keep my promises. I do what I am determined to do".
					
					 The offer made by such type of old lady can hardly be recognized as a sincere and honest one, it noted, and went on: 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities wish to have their proposal recognized as a sincere one, they should explain in detail the reason why they scuttled the reunion last year and put forward a solution.
					
					 However, they did not reflect on their wrong behavior but broached the same issue. Consequently, it cannot be recognized as a sincere one because it indicates the proposed reunion cannot but go bust again due to the same reason.

articles.title: Suppression of S. Korean Railway Trade Union under Fire
articles.content:
uppression of S. Korean Railway Trade Union under Fire
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations in south Korea held a press interview in Seoul on Jan. 20 in protest against the suppression of the Railway Trade Union, according to south Korean KBS.
					 At the interview the organization accused the railway corporation of putting pressure on the trade union through its moves to impose punishment and compensation for damage on about 500 unionists for the mere reason that they attended a strike.
					
					 The organization demanded the guarantee of the right of the trade union.

articles.title: Damage of Bird Flu Expand in S. Korea
articles.content:
Damage of Bird Flu Expand in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Damage of bird flu is expanding in North Jolla Province, south Korea, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Bird flu virus was discovered among migratory birds which were found dead in group in a reservoir in the areas of Kochang and Puan counties on Jan. 17.
					
					 Bird flu occurred in a duck farm of Kochang County and was additionally confirmed at three duck farms of Kochang and Puan.
					
					 There is a increasing concern over spread and expansion of damage caused by bird flu through the flight of migratory birds.

articles.title: Masikryong Ski Resort Introduced by Chinese Media
articles.content:
Masikryong Ski Resort Introduced by Chinese Media
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A TV broadcasting service, paper and internet website of China introduced the Masikryong Ski Resort of the DPRK.
					 The CCTV on Jan. 16 telecasted a program introducing the ski resort illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un giving field guidance to it.
					
					 The Masikryong Ski Resort, a comprehensive winter sports center newly built in the DPRK last year, is well known as Kim Jong Un provided field guidance to it several times, it said, giving detailed accounts of its geographical position, facilities, service and Masikryong Hotel.
					
					 The Chinese Global Times and Xinhua network carried articles on the ski resort under the titles such as "Experiencing speed of DPRK on Masik Pass" on Jan. 20.

articles.title: Apartment Houses for Educators of Kim Il Sung University Introduced by Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Apartment Houses for Educators of Kim Il Sung University Introduced by Russian Political Party
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Communist Workers Party of Russia belonging to the Communist Party of the Soviet Union on January 15 posted on its website an article and photos introducing the apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University.
					 The article titled "Loving care shown by General Kim Jong Un for educators, example to be followed" introduced in detail the apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University built at Ryonghung Crossroads in Pyongyang. It went on:
					
					 Such wonderful houses were distributed to teachers and researchers of the university free of charge.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that there is nothing to spare for teachers and researchers of the university training scientific talents to be responsible for the future of a thriving nation.
					
					 He personally initiated the construction of the apartment houses and visited the construction site several times to guide in detail the construction ranging from designing to building.
					
					 He also attended the ceremony for completing the apartment houses, congratulated teachers and researchers who will move to flats and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Teachers and researchers, who moved to the flats like a palace of which they cannot think even in dream, are determined to devote themselves to the educational work of the country and the development of science and technology.
					
					 Seeing the apartment houses for educators, the Korean people are convinced of the future of the country which will further prosper thanks to the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching importance to science and technology.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Mongolian Magazine
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Mongolian Magazine
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Mongolian magazine Mongolia Today recently edited special write-ups illustrated with a photo of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and photos introducing the DPRK.
					 It carried articles accompanied with photos showing Changjon Street, Pyongyang Metro, Kyongsang Kindergarten and others.
					
					 An article titled "The Juche idea and the Songun idea" said:
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing despite trials and difficulties.
					
					 It is the firm determination of HE Kim Jong Un to build a thriving nation without fail in the near future.
					
					 Is it possible to build a thriving nation? It goes without saying.
					
					 The DPRK is a nuclear weapons state and has the self-supporting and powerful economic foundation.
					
					 What is important in particular is that the DPRK is developing with the Juche idea and the Songun idea as its guidelines.
					
					 The Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung is the idea that the popular masses are the master of revolution and construction and they promote the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Juche idea indicates the way for realizing the popular masses' independence.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK government to accomplish the cause of socialism on the principle of Juche and national independence.
					
					 The Songun idea, the brilliant embodiment of the Juche idea, calls for attaching importance to the military affairs and placing it above all.
					
					 The DPRK is struggling to reunify the country independently by the federal formula under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea.

articles.title: Worker-Peasant Red Guards of DPRK Introduced by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Worker-Peasant Red Guards of DPRK Introduced by Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee on Jan. 16 posted an article on its website on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards.
					 The article said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the Worker-Peasant Red Guards on January 14, 1959.
					
					 The Worker-Peasant Red Guards are the powerful revolutionary armed forces of the Workers' Party of Korea, and are defending the country in close cooperation with the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The red guards made up of workers, farmers and other people are strongly armed and they are the people's armed forces which performed brilliant feats in the confrontation with the U.S. and the defense of the country.
					
					 The red guards, the militia firmly armed with the Juche-based war methods, are defending the country and pushing forward with socialist construction, holding high the slogan "Rifle in one hand and hammer or sickle in the other!"
					
					 They had developed into an invincible combat ranks which established the steel-strong military discipline under the leadership of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, and participated in military parades held in the DPRK.
					
					 They are growing to be the powerful armed forces of the party and the state under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA.

articles.title: U.S. Urged Not to Forget Disgrace and Lesson from Pueblo Incident
articles.content:
U.S. Urged Not to Forget Disgrace and Lesson from Pueblo Incident
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article warns the U.S. not to forget disgrace and lesson from the Pueblo incident.
					 On January 23, Juche 57 (1968), the U.S. intruded the spy ship Pueblo into the territorial waters of the DPRK. After the ship was captured by seamen of the Korean People's Army, the U.S. made an apology before the world, falling on its knees.
					
					 The U.S. persists in its hostile policy toward the DPRK, far from seriously looking back upon and repenting of its miserable defeat, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Before and after the Pueblo incident, the U.S. imperialists are viciously seeking head-on confrontation with the DPRK through a lot of war provocations. 
					
					 The U.S. has intensified military hostile acts against the DPRK by mobilizing huge aggression forces every year.
					
					 Entering this year, it is revealing its more dangerous attempts.
					
					 This is evidenced by the ill-boding moves of the U.S. massively deploying its aggression forces near the Military Demarcation Line after openly announcing that the large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills will be staged for two months from the end of February.
					
					 Present situation proves that the U.S. military threat and blackmail and policy of strength are reaching a more reckless phase.
					
					 Aggression will lead to disgrace and ruin, and reckless adventure will entail unimaginably catastrophic consequences. This is the truth taught by the history of confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists would be well advised to understand that if they try to ignite a new war through ceaseless war drills, oblivious of the lesson from the Pueblo incident, they would face a more miserable fate.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Madu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Madu
 Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Madu.
					 Esta base secreta de la zona de Anju, acondicionada en el periodo de lucha armada antijaponesa, fue centro de direccion regional e importante punto de operacion militar en la parte occidental de Corea.
					
					 Segun el proyecto operacional del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fueron acondicionadas en los puntos de favorables condiciones naturales y geograficas los campamentos secretos de los montes Madu, Sang, Jon y Thukmaek y formadas varias organizaciones revolucionarias.
					
					 De esa manera, se preparo el baluarte de la revolucion que permitio acelerar los preparativos de la resistencia de todo el pueblo y la operacion de ataque final para la liberacion de la patria.
					
					 Tras pasar revista a la sala de conservacion y educacion con los arboles con consignas inscritas, el Mariscal vio los otros al aire libre.
					
					 La zona de Anju, donde esta radicado el lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Madu, fue base importante de operaciones para acoger el gran acontecimiento de liberacion de la patria, dijo.
					
					 Prosiguio que solo con el hecho de que el Presidente escogio aqui como sede del campamento secreto, se puede saber que el fue gran hombre de extraordinaria prevision.
					
					 Senalo que en este lugar estan impregnadas las hazanas imperecederas del Presidente quien cumplio la historica causa de liberacion de la patria y el indoblegable espiritu de lucha del pueblo coreano que comenzo la nueva epoca de la lucha de liberacion nacional de colonias teniendole como centro de unidad y direccion.
					
					 El partido mantiene la firme voluntad y determinacion de defender y profundizar para siempre las tradiciones revolucionarias creadas por el Presidente y llevar a feliz termino la revolucion coreana, destaco.
					
					 Expreso la confianza y conviccion de que los empleados del lugar cumpliran perfectamente su mision y tomo una foto de recuerdo con ellos.
					
					 Recalco que los lugares de batalla revolucionaria son patrimonios eternos de nuestra revolucion, que no se puede comprar ni hacer ni con fabulosos fondos, e importantes puntos de educacion para armar a los militantes del partido, trabajadores, militares, jovenes y ninos con las tradiciones revolucionarias del partido. 
					
					 Seguidamente, presento las tareas importantes que serviran de guia en la administracion de esos lugares e intensificar la educacion en ellos.
					
					 Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Ma Won Chun, Kim Yong Chol y Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento tactico de unidad 323 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento tactico de unidad 323 de EPC
 Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el campo de entrenamiento tactico de la unidad 323 del EPC galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup y dirigio los ejercicios.
					 En el puesto de vigilancia, recibio el parte del plan de entrenamiento y dio la orden de comienzo.
					
					 Los combatientes atacaron y ocuparon de un tiron las "posiciones enemigas" antes de que los "enemigos" se despertaran.
					
					 Al ver que los combatientes asaltaban como relampago los objetos "enemigos" cumpliendo independiente y activamente las misiones aun en medio de las condiciones adversas, el Mariscal evaluo altamente a ellos diciendo que segun su opinion, se ejercitaron bien en los dias cotidianos.
					
					 Aprecio altamente a ellos quienes realizaron el entrenamiento a pesar de las condiciones geograficas y meteorologicas mas desfavorables.
					
					 Destaco que el entrenamiento se culmino con exito gracias a que los oficiales dirigieron el "combate" y cumplieron las misiones dificiles  a la cabeza de los militares.
					
					 Evaluo reiteradamente que los oficiales y funcionarios del estado mayor de la unidad hayan poseido la capacidad de organizar y dirigir con habilidad cualesquier operaciones modernas y batallas y que los uniformados hayan dominado perfectamente los reglamentos de accion de combate capaz de  cumplir satisfactoriamente las misiones combativas. Y dio el agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC a la unidad mencionada.
					
					 El Mariscal presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en organizar y hacer como batalla real el entrenamiento en el EPC.
					
					 Le acompanaron Ri Yong Gil, Kim Su Gil, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon y Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador pakistani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador pakistani 
 Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- Syed Hasan Habib presento este jueves en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan en Corea. 
					 Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Encuentro conjunto de amistad Corea-China por Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Encuentro conjunto de amistad Corea-China por Ano Nuevo
 Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 23 en la Granja Cooperativa de Thaek-am Amistad Corea-China del municipio de Sunan el encuentro conjunto de amistad Corea-China por el Ano Nuevo 2014 bajo coauspicios del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la  granja cooperativa mencionada, el Ministerio de Cultura de la Republica Popular China y la Embajada de la RPCh en Corea.
					 A la ocasion asistieron el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y del Comite Central de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-China, Kim Jin Bom, el vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Hong Kwang Ung, los funcionarios de ramas interesadas, los trabajadores agricolas de la mencionada granja, el embajador Liu Hongcai y los miembros de la embajada china en Corea y el conjunto de canciones y danzas de la provincia de Jilin de China.
					
					 Tras depositar los ramos de flores ante los letreros de instrucciones dadas sobre el terreno por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, los participantes escucharon las explicaciones de que bajo la direccion de los grandes hombres sin iguales la tierra de Thaek-am se ha convertido en el campo cultural socialista.
					
					 El embajador chino dijo que tambien este ano se esforzara en comun por lograr los exitos magnificos en varias ramas.
					
					 El vicepresidente Kim Jin Bom deseo que el pueblo chino alcance grandes exitos en los esfuerzos por hacer realidad el "sueno de China" para gran prosperidad de la nacion china.
					
					 A continuacion, hubo la funcion de los integrantes del grupo artistico de la granja y los artistas del conjunto citado.
					
					 La funcion, iniciada con la danza campesina y el baile folklorico de China, demostro bien el sentimiento de amistad de los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					 Tambien los participantes vieron las piezas creadas por los especialistas de bordado y artesania de China y probaron los platos nacionales de dos paises.
					
					 El mismo dia fue entregado a la granja el certificado de apoyo en nombre de la embajada china en Corea.

articles.title: Son incompatibles la paz y los ejercicios belicos, apunta ACNC
articles.content:
Son incompatibles la paz y los ejercicios belicos, apunta ACNC 
 Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ACNC) -- En el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal llamo a todos los integrantes de la nacion a levantarse en la lucha por defender la seguridad nacional y la paz para lograr un nuevo avance en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					 En respuesta a este llamamiento, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea propuso a la parte Sur preparar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y tomar las medidas practicas para defender la seguridad y la paz de la nacion. 
					
					 La propuesta, siendo una manifestacion de la voluntad patriotica de prevenir la tension militar y el peligro de guerra y lograr la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana, recibe fuertes aplausos de toda la nacion en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar. 
					
					 La paz es el anhelo nacional. Todos los miembros de la nacion no desean la guerra, la division y la confrontacion, sino la paz, la coexistencia y los intereses comunes entre el Norte y el Sur. 
					
					 La paz es mas preciosa que nada para la nacion coreana que sufrio incontables desastres por la guerra impuesta por el imperialismo norteamericano y vive durante varios decenios en medio de la amenaza de guerra. 
					
					 La paz constituye la premisa indispensable para la subsistencia y el desarrollo de la nacion, pero, los ejercicios belicos devienen el factor principal que amenaza cada momento la vida de la nacion. 
					
					 La paz es la garantia fundamental para la reunificacion de la patria y la prosperidad comun de la nacion. 
					
					 Al margen de la paz no se puede esperar la reconciliacion y cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas, ni la radiante perspectiva de la nacion. 
					
					 Solo en el ambiente pacifico la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar puede preparar mejores terrenos de la vida y lograr la eterna prosperidad de la patria. 
					
					 Pero, sin prestar oidos a esta demanda real, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas libran desde principios de este ano los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC emplazando en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno enorme cantidad de pertrechos de guerra nuclear. 
					
					 A finales de febrero, planean desarrollar los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC de gran dimension Key Resolve y Foal Eagle.
					
					 En el caso de que esos simulacros provoquen un minimo conflicto armado y se extiendan a la guerra total, sufrira los desastres la nacion coreana y se arruinara el territorio patrio. 
					
					 Son incompatibles la defensa de la paz y los ejercicios belicos. 
					
					 Para lograr la paz duradera de la Peninsula Coreana y defender el destino y seguridad de la nacion coreana, hay que acabar con los ejercicios belicos de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea. 
					
					 Hoy dia, la nacion coreana es la protagonista de la lucha contra la guerra y por la paz. 
					
					 Nadie puede defender la paz de Corea sustituyendo a la nacion coreana. 
					
					 Todos los integrantes de la nacion en el interior y exterior del pais que aman el pais y la nacion deben levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha por la defensa de la paz.
